page.title: 14Admiral St. Traffic Survey
page.content:
On the 5th June we conducted a traffic survey on Admiral Street.
We started our survey at 10 o'clock and finished at half past ten. During this time we saw 186 cars, 44 vans, 18 wagons, 23 taxis, 6 motor bikes, 10 buses, 10 bicycles and 1 tractor using Admiral Street. This was a total of 298 vehicles in thirty minutes using Admiral Street. We then calulated that the average hourly total of vehicles using Admiral Street would be 596.
We decided that with this amount of traffic using Admiral Street during the day that there was a good case for a zebra crossing being provided to help pedestrians get across Admiral Street.
